mapper.select: select * from documentinfo as t where t.author_id like concat(#{id},';%') or t.author_id like concat('%;',#{id},';%')

select t.author_id,t.author_name,t.affiliation,t.publish_count,t.heat,SUM(citing_count) AS citation from authorinfo_copy1_copy1 AS t,documentinfo AS m where t.author_id = #{id} AND (m.author_id LIKE CONCAT(#{id},';%') OR m.author_id LIKE CONCAT('%;',#{id},';%'))
select group_concat(terms separator '') as topics from documentinfo as t where t.author_id like concat(#{id},';%') or t.author_id like concat('%;',#{id},';%')

select t.author_id,t.author_name,t.affiliation,t.publish_count,SUM(citing_count) AS citation from (SELECT * from authorinfo_copy1_copy1 where author_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) t JOIN documentinfo AS m on (m.author_id LIKE CONCAT(t.author_id,';%') OR m.author_id LIKE CONCAT('%;',t.author_id,';%')) GROUP BY t.author_id
select t.author_name,t.affiliation,t.publish_count,t.heat,t.author_id from authorinfo_copy1_copy1 as t order by t.publish_count desc limit 10
select t.author_name,t.affiliation,t.publish_count,t.heat,t.author_id from authorinfo_copy1_copy1 as t order by t.heat desc limit 10
select t.author_keyword from authorinfo_copy1_copy1 as t where t.author_id = #{id}
